html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00992025-02-14FIN
ActBretton Woods and Related Agreements Act
SubjectOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide Ukraine with financial assistance
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO UKRAINE to a maximum of $ 4.8 billion in the form of sovereign loans, for the period of time beginning on the day on which the Minister of Finance is satisfied that the requirements set out in subsection 8.3(4) of the Act have been met, and ending on the earlier of March 31, 2026 or the day on which the Minister of Finance is no longer satisfied that those requirements are met.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO UKRAINE to a maximum of $ 4.8 billion in the form of sovereign loans, for the period of time beginning on the day on which the Minister of Finance is satisfied that the requirements set out in subsection 8.3(4) of the Act have been met, and ending on the earlier of March 31, 2026 or the day on which the Minister of Finance is no longer satisfied that those requirements are met.
